thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Catherine C-J
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Catherine C-J

author: Catherine C-J
title: Catherine C-J
text: This site was recommended to me by a friend and it was invaluable. It gives clear and detailed advice about what a solar installation comprises and the equipment required, to teaching you how to evaluate the numerous brands available and what standards are required. It provides a list of questions to ask companies that Quote: you and is independent so they aren't working for commission! They provided a broad range in the three companies they selected for me to receive Quote: s from, ensuring I was exposed to different options. I thoroughly recommend them.
